### Anzhal B端cher Container 
```{r}

  select(ISBN,Publisher)%>%
  group_by(Publisher)%>%
  summarise(Anzahl_der_B端cher = n())%>%
```

### Anzahl Bewertungen Container 
```{r}
Anzahlratings <- merge(BX_Books,BX_Book_Ratings) %>%
  group_by(Publisher)%>%
  summarise(Anzahl_der_Ratings = n())%>%

```
